title: Context Menu: Insert Chart not translated into Chinese
description: In the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
OB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
EB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option should be translated into Chinese.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to a layout where you can right-click.
3. Right-click to bring up the context menu.
4. Observe that the 'Insert Chart' option is not in Chinese.
